description: Some of our best straight guys have been refereed to us by a previous CircleJerkBoys and Cody is a prime example and even more so since he came to us by way of one of our favorites as any friend of Anthony's is a friend of ours without question! We're drying to find out of Anthony's has a sweet tooth so we're trying to get Cody to return and bring Anthony with him! We'll keep you posted!
title: Boston Boy, Scene #01
